content: Polsters need to figure out how to get there questions to pop up in our social media feeds, to reach a broader demographic.

All older folks, or just certain demographics?

If the population is dominated by older white men (and maybe white women), I could see the bias being reversed from 2016
Honestly the best thing to do is a variety of approaches, all with their own biases, and try to look for the consistent trends across those approaches
